title: Family Adventure: Our Awaji Island Trip

comments.comment: with all the youtubers turning out to be horrible people, its refreshing to see someone as loving and caring as felix.  I hope Bjorn appreciates you more and more as he grows.
These vlogs are like a warm hug, it’s like seeing an old friend doing well in life but it also makes you realize how quickly time passes.

30:15
It was amazing to see Björn process the emotions and generate a response, in children you can see the "cogs turning"
Everytime I watch a PewDiePie vlog, you get this warm fuzzy feeling like sitting next to the fire in a cabin when it's snowing outside. Love your vlogs Pewds (keep doing more please)
Seeing Björn start pointing towards the waterfall made me realize how big he’s getting! It’s so great to see you all happy, take care!
日本を楽しんでくれてる動画見てるの楽しいです。また新しい動画楽しみにしています。
こんな穏やかで素敵な家族が日本に溶けこんで生活してくれていることに感謝　赤ちゃん天使すぎるし、この３人の存在感がめちゃくちゃジブリ
Man, I find myself smiling watching the Father and Son interactions. So wholesome.

I’m not sure if it’s Marzia doing all the editing for these vids, but the way it’s done is so enjoyable and such a vibe. The music picked for the segments always seem to fit like a glove and just elevates and adds to the visuals so much. Props to the editing choices.
Pewds just casually living every man's dream life
That dude at 14:25 realized that PewDiePie was walking in front of him and just froze completely lol

知的な人が日本にいることはシンプルに嬉しい。
こういう情緒が理解できる人は大歓迎。
Felix and Marzia are the type of caring parents everyone needs

うわああああああ淡路島来てたんだ！！
ようこそ神戸へ
関西もいろんなところに行って楽しんで欲しいなあ
日本人でも行ったことない、知らないようなところに行ってくれるから、ほんとにこのブイログ楽しみ！
30:18 I think Bjorn forgot how to cry, he was like wait how was it again, the thing that I do that makes my parents do staff for me?
大阪、京都、奈良…激混みの観光地じゃないスポット、多くの人々が暮らす普通の街並み、景色、紹介する場面がノスタルジーで本当に素敵です
Björn‘s growing up so fast

I'm most impressed by how Pewds and Marzia teach Bjorn. When he is being loud they slowly repeat his name to aware him, when he's doing something he shouldn't, they again slowly and repeat not to do it. It's so different from how a lot of parent teach thier kids by grabbing hands, yelling, being angry. Love it.

いつも思うけど、マルツィアちゃんの洋服が可愛い
This channel is the most comforting and heartwarming thing in the world
2:49 The pride in Felix’s face when he realizes he is in the presence of a smart lil’ baby.

It’s really funny to see how Felix went from the most popular and a guy who was blamed for adpocolypse and etc. to basically single-handedly saving YouTube. When everyone trying to go big and corporate, he does what I think YouTube was created in the first place- just showing your day to day life and your hobby time to time.
忘れていた日本の四季の破片を上手に見つけて紹介してくれる。ありがたいです。ベイビー可愛すぎるよん！
the manager taking Björn to the kitchen window and the chef smiles at him   i love places like this nice staff nice people my day is good now
It’s crazy watching how smart baby bjorn has gotten. He’s already pointing and repeating words. He’s gonna be walking and running around soon. You guys are so blessed.🩷
え、ピューディパイめっちゃ日本語上手くなってる笑「すみません」がネイティブすぎ
14:28 Buddy is flabbergasted in the back
W Felix and Marzia for showing YouTube how to take care of a newborn and not exploiting like most “family channels” do

Felix is the personification of "a new chapter in life". I'm 24 now turning 25 next month, and I've been watching Pewdiepie since I was in middle school. Seeing someone I grew up watching and admiring become a father is reassuring that it's okay to grow up -- that life doesn't stop once you turn a certain age. When I turned 24 I started to enjoy the simple things and the challenges that come with adulthood. I'm very happy for Marzia and Felix. I'm happy that they're taking Bjorn on these little adventures because my parents weren't able to take me anywhere when I was small. It's extremely important that children see the world and learn from it as they grow. I'm just grateful to be alive right now and to witness this family's growth and harmony.
Its fresh to see a non-ipad baby. Felix and Marzia good parenting.
14:31 that guy was like " is that Pewdiepie?"
10:46 Was in this area two months ago. Beautiful peaceful neighbourhood.
With the all YouTubers showing their real sides and disgraceful behavior. It’s always nice to come back to Mr.Felix. It’s like a warm hug of wholeheartedly wholesomeness

Every now and then I get teary eyed watching these vlogs. From growing up alongside Felix and Marzia to watching them blossom into loving and wonderful parents feels like such a beautiful priviledge to have experienced over all these years. 
Thank you both for everything.

とにかく見せ方（魅せ方）が素晴らしいVlogだと思います。本当にお洒落♪
見てるだけでも心が温まり、和みます。
These blogs will be a great memory for Björn to look back on when he grows up and see how much his parents and the audience love him

watching Felix's interaction with Bjorn just makes me happy....I just love seeing japan through his videos

Beautiful little family and very well adjusted. It's lovely to see you cherish these precious moments of life and exploring so much of Japan. Marzia is gorgeous as always and I adore her cute dresses.
ビョルン君めっちゃ可愛い〜成長早いな

The Kjellberg family is definitely one of the most wholesome families I've ever seen, every video fills me with such joy. I am so happy to see how wonderful you are with raising Bjorn, he's probably one of the most well behaved children I've ever seen!

Watching Pewdiepie’s vlogs is like watching one of those animes in first person perspective where they get to travel with their loved ones to traditional places, museums and antique shops to spend quality time together. It’s so wholesome and relaxing.

These videos are so wholesome. <3
Marzia will forever be an angel and I hope she is forever unscarred by the hard side of this world. Both Pewd's and Marzia are wonderful

日本の美しい風景を感じて発信してくださる事が嬉しいです。
日本人ですが、ノスタルジックな気持ちになり、とても癒されます。
日本を楽しんでね！秋は美味しいものがたくさんあります！紅葉焼き芋落ち葉の香りも、私は好きです。

I love these videos, they really give me a big serotonin boost  my favorite part tho is 21:43 seeing Felix being a kid himself is so cute and sweet. I used to work at Disney World and I always loved seeing adults embrace their inner child

Bjorn is Lucky to have such a loving family around him, I'm 28, single, been a fan since like 2010 or something and dreaming to live a life like yours with so much love around you, these vlogs make me emotional
幸せなオーラが溢れててこっちまで嬉しくなるよ

I absolutely love these vlogs. I was just thinking of going on a trip to Awaji island. I went to Kyoto last month but didn't get to go there, here's to hoping I'll have the opportunity to go to Awaji next year
3:11 tell me how Japan’s waterfalls are even classy and polite I totally feel tricked about the moon, but I’m really glad I got to watch this. It’s changed my opinion on having a family.

子供って大きくなるのあっという間だね。
旅行とかいっぱい遊んですぐに大人になっちゃうよ。
Bjorn has such an adorable little smirk on his face so often, its so friggin cute
Pewds is living the life every boy dreams of growing up. I'm so happy for him. God bless you Felix, Marzia, and Bjorn. May this family grow and be prosperous.

日本だけでしか感じられない感性って言ってたからこその動画の魅せ方だよね。
この家族はいつまでも変わらずに居て欲しいし、なんなら全都道府県でなく全ての地方都市まで行って発信して欲しいくらい。
the stress i'm through in my life is unimaginable. the notification of your vlogs is just a warm hug for me. to let go of life and have a peace of mind. wish you a very happy life

まるで観光ガイドのような動画♡ 癒やされました

私は今、下北沢駅から2駅隣に住んでいます。私が生まれ育ったのは淡路島がある県です。Felixの家族が私の慣れ親しんだ街に行って良い日々を過ごしているのはとても嬉しいです
世界に紹介してくれてありがとうございます
The last bit made me cry. Beautiful family ️
Very calm, lovely and sweet life... Always very rocking and magnetic Pewds
Watching felix, bjorn and marzia happy makes me happy. Thank you for sharing these precious moments.

Its been a long journey watching these vids. 

I remember watching a few starting out in middle school, wondering what career I wanted to pursue. Then came high school, and it was a great laugh throughout all those AP classes and struggling with trying figure out college. 

Then that nightmare of a STEM major in college struck, but even then, it was nice to get a change of pace with you and many other youtubers throughout some of those hard subjects like Organic chemistry or physical biochemistry.

And here I am now, at my dream job after graduating college, actually having a lot more time to enjoy life and continue to pursue my own path.

As the content changed, we all changed too, and I appreciate how channels like this have grown with us all.

And I appreciate the viewers alongside me, as I'm sure our support has continued to grow with this channel too. 

Though we all may walk different paths, maybe not as straight and narrow as others, or as easy as others, I hope you have found or will find some peace wherever you are.

And wherever your journey has taken you at this point, I look forward to seeing how it continues, as I pursue my own.
I have a dream of going to japan someday. I look forward to these videos so much. Thank you for showing japans culture and the nature of japan. I love it so much!
I’ve gotta rewatch some of pewds old videos. It’s definitely time for a trip down memory lane
watching felix grow and change is awesome enough and now he has his own beautiful family  it makes me so happy seeing everything you all do together.
